data.title: Blood for Dust: Exclusive Trailer and Poster Debut
data.meta_description: IGN can exclusively debut the trailer and poster for the upcoming crime-thriller Blood for Dust, starring Scoot McNairy and Kit Harington. The film has been described as “Breaking Bad meets Fargo.”
data.text:
IGN can exclusively debut the trailer and poster for the upcoming crime-thriller Blood for Dust, starring Scoot McNairy (Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice) and Kit Harington (Game of Thrones).

The trailer can be viewed in the player above while the poster can be seen below.

Directed by Rod Blackhurst from a screenplay by David Ebeltoft, Variety described the film as “Breaking Bad meets Fargo.” Here’s the official synopsis to shed more light on the plot:

“Cliff (Scoot McNairy), a former salesman with a checkered past, is pulled back into a life of crime after losing his job. Desperate to keep his family afloat, lured by his old colleague, Ricky (Kit Harington), into trafficking drugs and guns for a cartel. As Cliff delves deeper, his once straight-laced life turns into a high-stakes game of survival.”

In addition to McNairy and Harington, the cast also includes Josh Lucas, Stephen Dorff, Ethan Suplee, Nora Zehetner, and Amber Rose Mason.

The Avenue will distribute Blood for Dust in theaters and on digital on April 19.
